info.name: TweetDeck - restore conventional tweet footer
info.description: Allows to revert the TweetDeck' tweet footer rearrangement from late April 2016.
info.additionalInfo: Provided are options to either completely revert the change, or keep the semi-transparent buttons but move them to the right and style the "view conversation" link to fit with buttons when the tweet is not being hovered upon.

options.label: Complete revert
Mixed
